attributes.action: Set up an independent committee to Make London Clean and Safe.
attributes.additional_details: All these problems haven't been taken seriously by the government.  The problems are getting very worse.  Residents find them living not in a civilized city.  They won't have a sense of belonging and well-being in this city.
attributes.background: To set up an independent committee to solve the problems in this city.  This affects seriously the routine life of residents. The problems are shopliftings, street robberies, litterings, graffiti defacing roadsigns, abandoned or speeding ebikes,  rough sleepers and tube beggars.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
